root.name: Alien vs Predator: The Last of His Clan
root.description: Critical ReceptionElectronic Gaming Monthly's Mike Weigand gave the review score of 6 out of 10, writing, "As if the one for the Super NES wasn't enough, here comes the portable version. Unfortunately the game plays like it should be on a bigger format, like the 16-bit maybe. All the action is confined on the tiny litle GameBoy screen and there needs to be more responsive control".
